Name: Magilore
About the game: Aaron and Ann were banished from the Kingdom of Magic when their parents were wrongly executed for treason. To learn the secrets of their heritage and rescue their captive siblings, they must win the leaders of the other elemental kingdoms to their side and uncover clues hidden in their world. Play as 12 different characters, explore 12 unique maps, and exercise your strategic thinking in Magilore - a new adventure RPG!
